review: I am changing my rating from 5 to 1. I would give it zero star if I could.Since setting up the Fire TV Stick when I first received it in November of 2014, I never tried to use it again till April 28th, 2015, and it wouldn't work even after I have spent half a day with three different Amazon tech support reps. They had me running through all kinds of hoops and we could not get the stick to connect to my wireless router, which is just a couple of steps away from the Stick. I have done several reboots of my router and the Stick still no go. I have several devices that connect to the same network with no problems. So I know it is the Stick, not my network. So I am just ditching the Stick as it is not worth the hours of hassles.
